Project Details

Cutting-Edge E-commerce Application:
Elevating User Experience with Java, Angular, Okta, and Stripe

Functionalities:

  • Display a list of products from database
  • Add products to the shopping cart
  • Implement CRUD operations for the shopping cart
  • Perform shopping cart checkout
  • Include user login/logout security
  • Track previous orders for logged-in users

Read more

go back

Introducing my e-commerce application! Crafted with Java on the backend and Angular on the frontend, this cutting-edge platform boasts a seamless user experience. Let me walk you through the amazing features that make it stand out.

First and foremost, I've integrated the renowned "Stripe" payment system, ensuring secure and hassle-free transactions for our users. Plus, logging in is a breeze, thanks to the efficient "Okta" implementation. Under the hood, the application utilizes MySQL, housing a sophisticated database with 8 tables, ensuring smooth data handling and organization. On the front end, users can effortlessly browse through an array of products from the main page. Additionally, they can narrow down their search by selecting specific product categories or using the search bar for convenience.

Once they find that perfect item, they can delve into its details and add it to their cart from anywhere within the app. The cart itself is a joy to use, as customers can easily adjust quantities or remove items entirely, with the total cost being neatly summarized.

When it's time to checkout, the process is streamlined and user-friendly. Entering their shipping address is a breeze, and if they've already filled in the billing address, the app can even auto-fill the shipping details. I've also added a clever feature that presents users with a list of available states based on their chosen country, saving them precious time and effort. For our logged-in users, the convenience continues as the app automatically fetches their email address, making the checkout process even faster.

And let's talk security! Stripe ensures the utmost data protection, meticulously verifying credit card details to uphold the highest safety standards. As an additional measure, I've implemented HTTPS to encrypt all data transmissions, safeguarding sensitive information from potential threats.

For testing purposes, I've gone the extra mile and generated a custom SSL certificate, ensuring the highest level of security even during development and testing phases. Once the order is placed, users receive prompt confirmation along with a unique order code, keeping them in the loop every step of the way.

Little bit more:

Home Page

  • Display application name (TheShop) and a search bar.
  • Show shopping cart status on the right.
  • Categorization options on the left.
  • Main content panel to display product list items.
  • Pagination feature at the bottom.

Product Details Page

  • Show detailed information about a selected product.
  • Display title, subtitle, price, and description.
  • Option to add the product to the cart.

Shopping Cart Details Page

  • List all items in the shopping cart.
  • Perform operations like quantity adjustment and removal.
  • Display subtotals and overall totals.
  • Provide a checkout button.

Checkout Page

  • Collect standard customer information
  • Gather credit card information.
  • Allow users to review their order before finalizing the purchase.
  • Include a purchase button to complete the checkout process.
